mapper.update: UPDATE OWNER SET OWNER_MENU=#{owner_menu} WHERE OWNER_SEQ=#{owner_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_SEQ, FILE_TNAME, FILE_RNAME, MENU_SEQ,MENU_NAME,MENU_PRICE,MENU_CATEGORY FROM MENU JOIN FILE_LIST USING (MENU_SEQ) WHERE MENU_SEQ=#{menu_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENU (MENU_SEQ, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, MENU_CATEGORY,MENU_DELFLAG) VALUES(MENU_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{menu_name}, #{menu_price}, #{menu_category},'N')
INSERT INTO FILE_LIST (FILE_SEQ, FILE_TNAME, FILE_RNAME, FILE_REGDATE, FILE_SIZE, MENU_SEQ) VALUES(FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{file_tname},#{file_rname},SYSDATE,#{file_size},#{menu_seq})
mapper.update: UPDATE MENU SET MENU_NAME=#{menu_name}, MENU_PRICE=#{menu_price} WHERE MENU_SEQ=#{menu_seq}
UPDATE FILE_LIST SET FILE_TNAME =#{file_tname}, FILE_RNAME=#{file_rname}, FILE_REGDATE=#{file_regdate}, FILE_SIZE=#{file_size} WHERE MENU_SEQ=#{menu_seq}
UPDATE MENU SET MENU_DELFLAG='Y' WHERE MENU_SEQ=#{menu_seq}
